channel.title: Comments on: Who Are The Top 5 Serve And Volley Players Of The Modern Era?
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Minos
item.dc:creator: Minos
item.description: Nice article, Rafter, McEnroe and Edberg are my favorites. Nowadays, you can see some players like Pierre Hughes Herbert, Feliciano Lopez or another australian like Jordan Thompson. They may not use Serve and Volley all the time, but are trying whenever they can on a good first serve.
item.content:encoded: Nice article, Rafter, McEnroe and Edberg are my favorites. Nowadays, you can see some players like Pierre Hughes Herbert, Feliciano Lopez or another australian like Jordan Thompson. They may not use Serve and Volley all the time, but are trying whenever they can on a good first serve.

item.title: By: Vcat
item.dc:creator: Vcat
item.description: Becker, come on, Becker! Put him at #1.
item.content:encoded: Becker, come on, Becker! Put him at #1.
